roleset.name: release too many
roleset.note: OVERRELEASE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'release.01'. (from overrelease.01-v)

example.name: args 0, 1, EXT, GOL
example.text: A key point , if reducing the housing prices is to be achieved , is not to allow banks to over-release loans -LRB- 60 % -RRB- to housing developers for the purpose of buying land and for the offending banks to offer one word : kill .
example.arg: to housing developers for the purpose of buying land
